DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine within the scope of the trial what the maximum tolerated dose (MTD) of lenalidomide in combination with AVD should be.
DOC.brief_title: Adriamycin, Vinblastine, DTIC and Revlimid in Elderly Hodgkin Lymphoma Patients
DOC.criteria: Hodgkin Lymphoma, intermediate or advanced stage Age >60 and <75 years ECOG 2 or better No major organ dysfunction Ability to take aspirin or LMW Heparin HL as composite lymphoma Prior use of lenalidomide Prior use of chemo or radiotherapy
